name: Ekans
flavorText:
Moves silently
and stealthily.
Eats the eggs of birds, such as
PIDGEY and
SPEAROW, whole.

previous.name: Fearow
previous.flavorText:
With its huge and
magnificent wings,
it can keep aloft without ever
having to land
for rest.

next.name: Arbok
next.flavorText:
It is rumored that
the ferocious
warning markings on its belly
differ from area
to area.
